channel.title: Server/Client
channel.description:
everytime i Start the client up , (yes the SERVER is on), it says this....error_game_invalidhost.. then my client is just a grey screen. My server is on air right now so ppl can get on and i dont understand why its saying invalid host.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2009, 09:53:23 pm[/size][hr]nvm i fixed

item.title: Server/Client
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

[quote=“Spider-killa, post:4, topic:293191”][quote author=Siccc link=topic=387416.msg2994677#msg2994677 date=1255492939]
Did you check Client.java , GUI.java(if you have) , Theres another GUI.java but forget its name you may not have them though. But check them and search for “ip” or the server ip and change it to yours. And did you use no-ip.com?
[/quote] well he should’ve used no-ip.com[/quote]

Well I didn’t know if he did. He may have not.

Read full topic
